title: Commander keen Desktop Wallpaper.
content:
I made a desktop background from the keen pic's in id anthology.

I think I did a good job with what I have, is there anyone that can make it look better than this?

[img]http://i109.photobucket.com/albums/n48/mikax238/keenid2.jpg[/img]

Right-click to download.

[img]http://i109.photobucket.com/albums/n48/mikax238/keenid2.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img180.imageshack.us/img180/9637/keenid2jk3.jpg[/img]

title: Re: Commander keen Desktop Wallpaper.
content:
Nice wallpaper. It'll look good on one of my Keen-O-Matics.

The art on those Keen Dreams disks look interesting. I don't think I've ever seen them before.

title: Re: Commander keen Desktop Wallpaper.
content:
Indeed, it would be nice to see the seperate pictures used in the wallpaper so we could appreciate them properly.
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Cute bunny!

title: Re: Commander keen Desktop Wallpaper.
content:
Wow, is that official Keen art on that wallpaper?
In that case, nice!-----------------
[img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/s/jcw/img/logo_jamster_navi.gif[/img][img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Falling.gif[/img]

title: Commander keen Desktop Wallpaper, appreciate it.
content:
You want to see the seperate pictures used in the wallpaper so everyone could appreciate them properly.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img]

Ok.

This is every picture of keen used in the wallpaper (Download it, I did my best) from The id Anthology.

[img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/2204/pic1ru0.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img180.imageshack.us/img180/676/pic2mc2.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img82.imageshack.us/img82/4398/pic3yf8.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img178.imageshack.us/img178/1935/pic4ls3.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/6066/pic5es6.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/707/pic6se8.jpg[/img]
Yep...It fits!

[img]http://img95.imageshack.us/img95/8600/pic7lu5.jpg[/img]

With all of this you could probably make a better desktop wallpaper.

title: Re: Commander keen Desktop Wallpaper, appreciate it.
content:
Cheers, it looks good! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] And yep, never seen (most of) those pictures before! If it's official Keen art, cool! And nice looking fan art if it's not official. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Commander keen Desktop Wallpaper, appreciate it.
content:
Some of that art looks disturbingly like Romero's, therefore I would say its 'cert'
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Cute bunny!

title: Re: Commander keen Desktop Wallpaper, appreciate it.
content:
That is one nice collage you made there. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: Commander keen Desktop Wallpaper, appreciate it.
content:
Hey check out the words on the note book paper.

When clicking 123 & tiles at bottom, check for existence of planes!

Make no tile = no icon.

Interesting?
